"We don't make mistakes; we have happy accidents."
"If you've never lived with a squirrel, you haven't lived."
"Just beat the devil out of it."
"I really believe that if you practice enough you could paint the 'Mona Lisa' with a two-inch brush."
"Just go out and talk to a tree. Make friends with it."
"In painting, you have unlimited power. You have the ability to move mountains. You can bend rivers."
"You need the dark in order to show the light."
"Look around. Look at what we have. Beauty is everywhere - you only have to look to see it."
"The secret to doing anything is believing that you can do it."
"Anything that you believe you can do strong enough, you can do. Anything. As long as you believe."
"You have unlimited power on this canvas."
"I guess I'm a little weird. I like to talk to trees and animals. That's okay though; I have more fun than most people."
"There's nothing wrong with having a tree as a friend."
"I've started with a thin, even coat of liquid white."
"It's wet, slick, and ready to go."
"You can do anything in your world."
"This is your world, and you have to design it the way you want it."
"I still have not cleaned the brush. I'm lazy."
"Just before the show I went to the bathroom. Needless to say, with a wireless mic, when I came back everybody knew where I'd been."
"It's a good day to be alive. Come to think of it, every day's a good day to be alive."
"I'm sure there's a proper name for these clouds. I just call 'em little stringy clouds."
"I know there's an old coyote sitting out there. I can just sort of feel it."
"I know you're saying already, \"Bob, you've messed this one up.\" You may be right."
"You can make these clouds with a one-inch brush, two-inch brush, fan brush. Shoot, you could make 'em with your shoe."
"This year, I raised seven little birds."
"Caress the canvas; make love to it."
"From all of us here: Happy painting, and God bless."
"Talent is a pursued interest. Anything that you're willing to practice, you can do."
"I can't think of anything more rewarding than being able to express yourself to others through painting."
"Exercising the imagination, experimenting with talents, being creative; these things, to me, are truly the windows to your soul."
"I started painting as a hobby when I was little. I didn't know I had any talent. I believe talent is just a pursued interest. Anybody can do what I do."
"Lets build a happy little cloud. Lets build some happy little trees."
"Let your imagination take you anywhere you want to go."
"Anybody can put a masterpiece on canvas with just a little practice."
"Trees cover up a multitude of sins."
"Tell you what, let's do put a little cloud in there."
"The selling of the work is not important; what's important is the fact that someone is willing to pay you for something you created."
"You can do anything here, absolutely anything."
"The only thing worse than yellow snow, is green snow."
"Just like any muscle in your body, your imagination increases proportionately to the amount of practice you give it."
"If there's any secret to anything that you're ever good at, it's just practice."
"I believe every day's a good day when you paint."
